text: Remember that time Katy Perry, Miley Cyrus, Bella Thorne, and Iggy Azalea all had a girls'night at Paris Hilton's abode? Well, we do. And since we didn't get an invite, Iggy spilled all about that fabulous evening during Sunday's Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen. It was there that she revealed some of the secrets of Paris'house. ` ` It's just like all fabulous pictures of Paris Hilton. My favorite, like the best thing in her house, I promise she has this gigantic — well there's a lot of pictures of herself, which I love [ and ] there should be — but the best picture of herself is this giant picture of Paris Hilton and she's wearing a Guess shirt and it says, '
